Attributes.description: Variational and Approximate Methods in Applied Mathematics
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of MATH 307, CPSC 302 and either (a) a score of 80% or higher in one of MATH 256, MATH 257, MATH 316, MATH 358, MECH 358, PHYS 312 or (b) MATH 400.
